attributes.action: as to why from the top of Government to lowly council officers will be given unprecedented powers to access details of every phone call in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Does this mean we have no garentee  that private and sensitive information wont  inevitably fall into the wrong hands? The government are intending to  bring out new rules  to compel phone companies to retain information, however private, about all land line and mobile calls, and make them available to some 795 public bodies and quangos. 
It is a free for all. There is a lack of oversight of how and why public bodies are using these records. There is no public record of what they are using this information for.'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
